name: ROSSK – Website File Monitor
author: Ross Kernez

sections.description: This plugin provides monitoring of file changes on your WordPress website. It can track modifications to themes, plugins, and core files, alerting you immediately to any suspicious activity or potential security breaches.
sections.faq:
How frequently is the scan performed?

The plugin is designed to perform a scan on daily basis by default, so you will stay up to day.

What files does the plugin monitor?

The plugin monitors changes to core WordPress files, themes, plugins, and custom files within your website’s directory.

Is the plugin compatible with all WordPress themes and plugins?

While the plugin is generally compatible with most WordPress themes and plugins, there may be rare cases where conflicts can occur. If you encounter any issues, please consult the plugin’s documentation or support forum.

short_description: Monitors file changes on your WordPress site, alerts you to suspicious activity, and helps improve security and performance.
description: This plugin provides monitoring of file changes on your WordPress website. It can track modifications to themes, plugins, and core files, alerting you immediately to any suspicious activity or potential security breaches.

screenshots.caption: A list of recent file changes. Each row represents a specific file modification.
